position: Team Member at EVG IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Web Scraper
experience.description: Web Scraper | Python | Beautifulsoup• Built a web scraper and implemented it to retrieve data from the online website Amazon with just the URL of the page• Implemented the model using python libraries Beautifulsoup, RegEx, sqlite3, and Request modules to retrieve data• Stored the data in SQLite DataBase (using DB Browser), to help visualize and process the data more efficiently• Currently working on expanding the model on other shopping sites, to provide an efficient way to compare andanalyse the data
experience.description_html: Web Scraper | Python | Beautifulsoup• Built a web scraper and implemented it to retrieve data from the online website Amazon with just the URL of the page• Implemented the model using python libraries Beautifulsoup, RegEx, sqlite3, and Request modules to retrieve data• Stored the data in SQLite DataBase (using DB Browser), to help visualize and process the data more efficiently• Currently working on expanding the model on other shopping sites, to provide an efficient way to compare andanalyse the data

experience.title: Team Member
experience.description: Embedded Systems | Electric Vehicle Group | IIT Kharagpur• Explored the usage of S32K144 microcontroller using Kinetis Design Studio, an integrated developmentenvironment for microcontrollers, worked under Professor Vikranth Racheria and the founding members of the EVG• Currently working with the hardware team to design and stimulate flyback switch mode power converter for DC toDC Voltage conversion and also test and stimulate the flyback power converter in PCB designing software
experience.description_html: Embedded Systems | Electric Vehicle Group | IIT Kharagpur• Explored the usage of S32K144 microcontroller using Kinetis Design Studio, an integrated developmentenvironment for microcontrollers, worked under Professor Vikranth Racheria and the founding members of the EVG• Currently working with the hardware team to design and stimulate flyback switch mode power converter for DC toDC Voltage conversion and also test and stimulate the flyback power converter in PCB designing software <!---->

experience.title: Core Team Member
experience.description: • Worked under the Technology Students Gymkhana on 3 fronts-Sponsorship, Accommodation and Event Management• Organized 548 events, Cultural Nights, and Guest lectures which saw a participation of 3000+ students from 23 IITs• Generated INR 3.5 Million through Sponsorship from 45 companies (200% YOY Increase) for the 54th edition of Meet• Introduced Live Streaming, Live Score Update, adventure, and recreational Activities from the Sponsorship raised• Led a team of 12 Team Members for the planning, execution, and operation of the 9-day long sporting extravaganza• Responsible for catering the branding &publicity requirements of all the 45 companies during the 54th Sports Meet
